reviews.title: Totally Eccentric Experience
reviews.text: I first went to Liepaja a little over two years ago. I was resigned to say in some concrete ex-Soviet monstrosity of a hotel, which is all I have ever been able to find in Eastern Europe outside the capital cities.

reviews.title: Charming, bohemian, yet impossible to sleep
reviews.text: We stumbled across the Fontaine Palace by accident and were so glad that we did as it is most definitely a unique experience.
